p: The turmeric essential oil yield extracted with hexane was 0.39% (dwt; 1.93 g) and of ar-turmerone obtained from this essential oil was 82% (dwt) after the chromatographic separations of the initial material (1.58 g turmeric powder). A total of 3.2 g of ar-turmerone was present per kilogram of rhizomes of this plant grown in Catalão, Goiás State, Brazil.
